name: A Garden On Mars
description: Bruce McRae, a Canadian musician and multiple Pushcart nominee, has had work appear in hundreds of publications around the world. The winner of 2020 Libertto Chapbook Prize (20 Sonnets), his books include "The So-Called Sonnets'; 'An Unbecoming Fit of Frenzy'; 'Like As If'; 'All Right Already' and 'Hearsay'.
